name: Tap Miner
description:
Mining has never been so fun!

Mine for precious gems, gold, and even potatoes as Max the Miner with this tapper game, Tap Miner.

Hire and evolve creatures to help you mine even faster!

Upgrade your character and tap your way to great fortune and wealth.

Features include:

●Mine for gold, sapphires, emeralds, topazes, amethysts, and the ultra-rare potatoes

●Hire friendly units to mine for you like snails and rock golems

●Evolve them multiple times to be even more powerful

●Tap your way to a high score

●Cute graphics great for any age

●Level up and become even more powerful

●Unlock special abilities like dinomining or gemsplosion

●Upgrade your hero with perks and mine even faster

●Unlock unique character skins for your miner

●Unlock TONS of achievements with new ones added regularly

●No level caps at all. Tap forever!

●Reset your score for permanent boosts

●Leaderboards to compete with players around the world

Tap or click your way to greatness today and fill your pockets with gems and gold! Download for free.

Check us out!
